message: Let's split fairly, but I get a little extra since the money loses value for me over time.
I'll give you a fair share, but I need a bit more since the money doesn't lose value for me.
This is a fair deal, Bob. I'm losing money with each round, and this is the last time I'll accept a 50/50 split.
You said that was your last 50/50 offer, so I'll take a bit more this time.
This is my final offer, Bob. It's more than you've offered, and the clock is ticking for both of us.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not convinced. The inflation is affecting you, not me.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. We both lose if this fails. This is my absolute last offer. Take it or leave it.
I'm not buying the 'absolute last offer' threat. You're losing value with each round, I'm not.
